overview:
Currently Head of the Web Communications Team for Linalis, Nicolas Bocquet has spent the last 10 years in various positions, in the management and continuous evolution of IT infrastructure for many diverse clients.

As an Early Bird Open Source Enthusiast, Nicolas has worked on a wide range of complex projects and has successfully adopted FLOSS Software in many industries, including Government, Healthcare, Non Governmental Organisations, Education, Financial Sector & Industry. Today his focus at Linalis with his team is to provide Web Communications expertise to their clients, especially on high value added projects in the areas of Website developments & Data Integration, Intranet, E-commerce and Data Analytics & Visualization.
